verbs.description: [ARGM-MNR: slow] - [V: cooked] [ARG1: sirloin] my family of five likes to eat beef so this recipe is a favorite i usually serve it with homemade bread or rolls to soak up the tasty gravy —vicki tormaschy dickinson north dakota
